an3.72:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma anando kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
an3.72:1.2: Atha kho annataro ajivakasavako gahapati yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam anandam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so ajivakasavako gahapati ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.72:2.4: “Tena hi, gahapati, tannevettha patipucchissami, yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
an3.72:2.6: ye ragassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, dosassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, mohassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, tesam dhammo svakkhato no va?
an3.72:2.8: “Ye, bhante, ragassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, dosassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, mohassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, tesam dhammo svakkhato.
an3.72:3.2: ye ragassa pahanaya patipanna, dosassa pahanaya patipanna, mohassa pahanaya patipanna, te loke suppatipanna no va?
an3.72:3.4: “Ye, bhante, ragassa pahanaya patipanna, dosassa pahanaya patipanna, mohassa pahanaya patipanna, te loke suppatipanna.
an3.72:4.2: yesam rago pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, yesam doso pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, yesam moho pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, te loke sukata no va?
an3.72:4.4: “Yesam, bhante, rago pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, yesam doso pahino …pe… yesam moho pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, te loke sukata.
an3.72:5.2: ‘ye, bhante, ragassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, dosassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, mohassa pahanaya dhammam desenti, tesam dhammo svakkhato’ti.
an3.72:5.4: ‘ye, bhante, ragassa pahanaya patipanna, dosassa pahanaya patipanna, mohassa pahanaya patipanna, te loke suppatipanna’ti.
an3.72:5.6: ‘yesam, bhante, rago pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, yesam doso pahino …pe… yesam moho pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, te loke sukata’”ti.
an3.72:6.2: Na ceva nama sadhammukkamsana bhavissati, na ca paradhammapasadana.
an3.72:6.3: Ayataneva dhammadesana, attho ca vutto, atta ca anupanito.
an3.72:6.4: Tumhe, bhante ananda, ragassa pahanaya dhammam desetha, dosassa …pe… mohassa pahanaya dhammam desetha.
an3.72:6.6: Tumhe, bhante ananda, ragassa pahanaya patipanna, dosassa …pe… mohassa pahanaya patipanna.
an3.72:6.8: Tumhakam, bhante ananda, rago pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo, tumhakam doso pahino …pe… tumhakam moho pahino ucchinnamulo talavatthukato anabhavankato ayatim anuppadadhammo.
an3.72:7.2: Seyyathapi, bhante, nikkujjitam va ukkujjeyya, paticchannam va vivareyya, mulhassa va maggam acikkheyya, andhakare va telapajjotam dhareyya: ‘cakkhumanto rupani dakkhanti’ti; evamevam ayyena anandena anekapariyayena dhammo pakasito.
an3.72:7.3: Esaham, bhante ananda, tam bhagavantam saranam gacchami dhammanca bhikkhusanghanca.
an3.72:7.4: Upasakam mam ayyo anando dharetu, ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
